title: Wild for You
description: Fireflies, night swimming, and falling for my best friend.He’s all I ever wanted—all I thought I’d ever need.Hearing he didn’t feel the same gutted me.And when he left, he took my whole heart with him.Six years later, he finds me and turns my quiet life upside down.He convinces me to go back to the lake—where it all started.Where we’ll get a whole new beginning …And say a final goodbye.
author: Amanda Bailey
